00049   :Event(aName) {

00136 void Top::Print() {
00137 
00138   *outputFile << "%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%" << endl;
00139   *outputFile << "TOP LEVEL:  " << theName << endl;
00140   *outputFile << "    |  StartTime:  " << setw(7)<< theStartTime * uPerSec <<
00141         " units  " << setw(8) << theStartTime << setw(4) << "sec" << endl;
00142   *outputFile << "    |  Duration:   " << setw(7) << theDuration * uPerSec <<
00143         " units  " << setw(8) << theDuration << setw(4) <<"sec" << endl;
00144 }
